name: Gister
body:
## Gister 
Create and share Gists quickly within Visual Studio 2010 and 2011.

Find Gister in the Visual Studio Extension manager or download it [here](visualstudiogallery.msdn.microsoft.com/b31916b0-c026-4c27-9d6b-ba831093f6b2) 

### License
Gister is distributed under the MIT license.  See license.txt.

### Support or Contact
Find me on create an issue or ask questions on twitter @cromwellryan.
tagline: Gister creates gists in Visual Studio
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
